danbikel.parser

Interface WordList

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Collection, FixedSizeList, Iterable, List, Serializable, SexpConvertible

    public interface WordList
extends FixedSizeList, SexpConvertible
    An interface to specify a fixed-size list of Word objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WordList copy()
      Returns a deep copy of this word list.
      Word getWord(int index)
      Gets the Word object at the specified index.
